title: De Kraak
overview: After two years in prison, professional con man Alidor Van Praet needs to rebuild the illegal fortune the police seized from him. When he spots 19-year-old Jeremy Peeter's hacking skills at a computing convention, he knows this shy teenager is the key to making it happen. Together with Alidor's expert team, they mastermind a plan that is as ingenious as it is daring: to hijack the digital highway of money transfers that run between banks.
